school_info: üåü Shining Smiles School offers quality education from *ECD-A to Form 6*, with both *Zimsec* and *Cambridge* curricula, fostering academic excellence and personal growth. Student Teacher Ratio: 1:25.

fees_policy.general_info: Fees vary based on grade level and curriculum. For specific quotations, contact Admin WhatsApp: +263783585183.
payment_terms: Fees must be paid before the first day of term.
Installment plan: Minimum 80% required before first day of term.
If paying in instalments: 70% before first day of term, 30% before the 1st of the last month of term (1 March, 1 July, 1 November).
Refunds capped at 70%, via original payment method.
POP required for confirmation, but does not count as receipt.
fees_policy.gate_pass_policy: Issued after confirmation of fees payment. No entry without valid gate pass.

general_rules: Fares announced a month before term.
Must be paid in advance (installments allowed: 3 per term).
Transport contract valid for the full term once payment is made.
Parents must provide correct address and 2 contacts.
Changes in pickup/drop-off must be communicated in advance.
private_transport: Changes in pickup person must be communicated in advance.
Uncollected learners after 1700h will be transported by the school at commercial rates.
school_premises_rules: No hooting, alcohol, smoking, or loud music
Decent clothing encouraged when dropping/picking learners

form_1: Grade 7 result slip or entrance test results
other_requirements: Copy of ID Parent or Guardian

where_are_the_offices.short_answer: Our admin office is at *39 Winson Road, Hatfield, Harare*. ‚úÖ
where_are_the_offices.detailed_answer: We also have branches at *14 Alexandra Drive, Hatfield*, *1 Mudimu Village, Ziko, Chitungwiza*, and *142 Kilwinning Road, Hatfield*.

when_do_schools_open.short_answer: üìÖ Schools open *9 Sept 2025* and close *4 Dec 2025*.
when_do_schools_open.detailed_answer: Classes run from 0800h - 1500h daily, earliest drop at 0645h, latest pickup 1545h.

how_to_apply.short_answer: üìù Apply via _www.shiningsmilescollege.ac.zw_ or visit our offices.
how_to_apply.detailed_answer: You can also email _admin@shiningsmilescollege.ac.zw_ for the admission form and requirements. Registration fees are one-time, non-refundable.

what_curriculum_do_you_offer.short_answer: üìñ We offer *Zimsec* and *Cambridge*, from ECD-A to Form 6.

what_extracurriculars_are_available.short_answer: ‚öΩ We offer sports, music, debate, STEM, and Arts Enrichment.
what_extracurriculars_are_available.detailed_answer: Students can join soccer, basketball, music band, drama, debate club, coding, and art workshops.

what_is_the_uniform_policy.short_answer: üëï Learners must wear the prescribed summer/winter uniform.

how_much_are_the_fees.short_answer: üí∞ Fees vary by grade. Please request a fee schedule or contact Admin.
how_much_are_the_fees.detailed_answer: Primary: $400/term. High School: $650-$750/term. Registration: $200 (Primary), $150 (High School). Contact +263783585183 for quotes.

is_transport_provided.short_answer: üöç Yes, we provide school transport for Harare & Chitungwiza.
is_transport_provided.detailed_answer: Fares range from $100 to $250 depending on route and one-way/return options. See *transport_policy* for full price list.

do_you_have_boarding.short_answer: üè† We are currently a *day school only*.
do_you_have_boarding.detailed_answer: Boarding facilities are under review and may be introduced in future expansions.

what_are_operating_times.detailed_answer: Earliest drop: 0645h | Latest pickup: 1545h (late fee $10 applies after 1545h).
